mapper.select: SELECT m.ma_id, i.in_id, o.order_id, m.ma_name, o.order_qty, m.ma_qty, o.add_ma, i.in_process, m.whs_id, m.shelt_position, o.in_date, i.in_emp FROM orders o LEFT JOIN in_material i ON o.order_id = i.order_id LEFT JOIN material m ON o.ma_id = m.ma_id ORDER BY in_process, order_id DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE orders o LEFT JOIN material m ON o.ma_id = m.ma_id SET o.add_ma = o.order_qty + m.ma_qty
UPDATE material m LEFT JOIN orders o ON m.ma_id = o.ma_id SET m.ma_qty = m.ma_qty + o.order_qty WHERE o.order_id = #{order_id} AND m.ma_id = #{ma_id}
